an8.48:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye.
an8.48:1.2: Atha kho nakulamata gahapatani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe…. Ekamantam nisinnam kho nakulamataram gahapatanim bhagava etadavoca:
an8.48:2.1: “Atthahi kho, nakulamate, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an8.48:2.3: Idha, nakulamate, matugamo yassa matapitaro bhattuno denti atthakama hitesino anukampaka anukampam upadaya tassa hoti pubbutthayini pacchanipatini kinkarapatissavini manapacarini piyavadini.
an8.48:3.2: matati va pitati va samanabrahmanati va—
an8.48:3.3: te sakkaroti garum karoti maneti pujeti, abbhagate ca asanodakena patipujeti.
an8.48:4.1: Ye te bhattu abbhantara kammanta—unnati va kappasati va—tattha dakkha hoti analasa tatrupayaya vimamsaya samannagata alam katum alam samvidhatum.
an8.48:5.1: Yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano—dasati va pessati va kammakarati va—
an8.48:5.2: tesam katanca katato janati akatanca akatato janati, gilanakananca balabalam janati khadaniyam bhojaniyancassa paccamsena samvibhajati.
an8.48:6.1: Yam bhatta aharati dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va tam arakkhena guttiya sampadeti, tattha ca hoti adhutti atheni asondi avinasika.
an8.48:7.1: Upasika kho pana hoti buddham saranam gata dhammam saranam gata sangham saranam gata.
an8.48:9.1: Cagavati kho pana hoti vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacaga payatapanini vossaggarata yacayoga danasamvibhagarata.
an8.48:10.1: Imehi kho, nakulamate, atthahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana manapakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjatiti.
